ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: This work benefited from the support of “Investissements d’avenir” of the French National Agency for Research (Labex CEBA, ref. ANR-10-LABX-25-01). The authors thank Pierre Silland, Mehdi Khodjet El Khil and Caroline Makerri for technical support, and Dr Maria do Rosario Silva (Federal University of Goiás Hospital, Brazil) and Laila Salmen Espindola (University of Brasília) for providing the strains.
